title: Why can't i win in league of legends
body:
League is a team based game a lot of silvers don't understand, but i do i can't carry because they don't understand. I lost 5+ games in a row and can't even win one game. How can i at least win one game in this toxic community. Should i just play champs i main or be a team player for the team.
I was silver 1 once got demoted because of toxic community and no teamwork. In silver they only care about their  kda  but why cant they just understand  that its about objectives. Please Rito inform the toxic silvers to care about objectives not kills. Rito i love this game but can you try to inform players it not call of duty. Thanks Rito.

I agree with this dude here, get those deaths down. The less you get caught out and die, the better your chances are.

Play champs you main, even out of usual position. Ignore your team when they tell you to do stupid shit like 2v5 invade dragon, unless they show signs of being mature and competent and have an actual plan.

Do not waste your time trying to cooperate with or save trash players, just focus on opportunities and getting as fed as possible from farming (and usually defending while they feed).

Do not waste time arguing with children, you cant win - they are immune to logic, reason, common sense, basic strategy, sarcasm, humor, and flaming. If they want to cry, let them cry, /ignore and focus on the game. Replying just makes them tilt themselves harder.

Never try to help a feeding bot lane, unless you have A; more backup (ie 4v2) or B; really good gank synergy. Chances are you will just die 3v2 if they are already ahead and have your bot under turret. Same goes for fed top juggernauts.

How to win in League of Legends

1. Play one champ, but main at least 3 just in case your favorite gets banned/picked.
2. Farm CS.
3. Do not trade early game with enemies when there is a wave of enemy minions in between you guys.
4. Help your team. Want to know why they are toxic? It is because they are tilted, they are dying non stop. Ganking them will help them gain back momentum.
5. Actually try. People just go into League leaning back not caring really, but you need to try. Trying makes you better, doing less than the best you can does not improve your play style.
6. Place wards in enemy jungle early game instead of warding the river. This way you know if the enemy jungler is farming top side or bot side. If the enemy jungler is mia, then he is either about to gank someone or hes back at base. So do not take risks to all in someone if their enemy jungler is mia.
7. Use the right runes/masteries/items. When I played Jayce on this account (about 2 months ago?), I would use armor pen runes to put more damage in enemies. But it was a lot harder to get cs. Then on my main account, I use all AD runes, now i get the most cs every game I play.
8. If people do become toxic, just ignore it/mute them. Responding to them only fuels them to talk more shit to your team, and when they do that, your team begins to bash the toxic player to where he does not care if you win or lose.

Good luck!

Play your main, thats what I do and I have a 60% win rate. In silver you can still easily solo carry if you know what your doing. 
I feel like we wont start getting punished for lack of team coordination until high gold.

If you are playing Solo you gotta forget about Tem Wurk.

I climbed this year by playing a Champion who suits my playstyle and can do a lot of punching alone rather than with a team.

EAch lane has different ways to Carry and it's your job to figure out how to do so in Solo.
